jobDescription: ROBERT HALF is actively looking for a proven Data Analyst candidate in the banking industry with a strong background in Derivatives for a contract based opportunity with our large bank client in Plano! You will be assisting the team with their OTC Derivatives valuation. This is a unique opportunity to work with a high profile bank and gain exposure to all types of OTC Derivatives products. The team is looking for someone who has a very strong technical skillset, including proficiency in Python, R, Scala, Tableau, Bloomberg, Reuters. Also Hadoop is a plus. Must have a solid background in statistics and also must have a strong knowledge of OTC Derivatives and big data analytics. Please note that with this client we can only work with candidates on a W2 basis.  Please apply today with your resume in a Microsoft Word document for immediate consideration! Job Duties:Provide independent valuation services to internal and external clients across a wide array of OTC derivative products including rates, credit, equity, FX, inflation, cmdty, and volatility / variance swaps Producing and analyzing valuation movements within client portfolios on a daily basis.Establish and develop strong relationships with both internal and external clientsResolve ad?hoc issues, including queries related to third party valuations, procedures and processesSpot trends in complex and unstructured data sets
